thread.section_title: FloraQueen opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre FloraQueen | www.floraqueen.com
thread.title: Vanessa ten Hoff
thread.title_full: FloraQueen evaluado por Vanessa ten Hoff

author: Vanessa ten Hoff
title: Vanessa ten Hoff
text:
I have used Flora Queen twice now and both times the service and especially the support were excellent! I had one very specialized and personalized request and one request chosen from the web - both were excellent.
Feedback and support in both cases were immediate.
Thank you
